description: Variation of condition 1 pursuant to planning permission 18/6562/S73 dated 08/03/2021 for 'Demolition of existing two-storey dwelling and garage and construction of new two storey dwelling including basement and rooms in roof space in order to provide 8 no. self-contained residential units. Associated cycle and refuse storage and car ramp.' Amendments to include internal layout amendments to apartments on all floors; alterations and additions to fenestration; Reduction in basement size to the front and extended to the rear and right hand side (as seen from Bishops Avenue); amendments to vehicular ramp and internal amendments to the layout of the basement; removal of a total of 2 no. chimneys; side cornice raised to match the main roof cornice; stone balustrade replaced with metal railings and brick piers; ground floor bay extended; increase in ridge height of part of the building; amendment to porch design; two approved dormers to second floor enlarged into one larger dormer on rear (west) elevation; flat rooflights relocated and reduced in number on the roof of the building; alteration and enlargement of dormer on south elevation; Cornice to gable removed [AMENDED DESCRIPTION]
